text: "Grind" is a 1995 song by Alice in Chains and is the leading single to their third studio album Alice in Chains. It went to number 7 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock chart, number 23 in the United Kingdom, number 53 in Canada and number 77 in Australia. It was nominated for Grammy Award in 1996. ==Track listing== * Tracks one and two were originally included on Alice in Chains * Track three was originally included on Jar of Flies * Track four was originally included on Facelift ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Alice in Chains songs Category:Alternative rock songs
title: Grind (song)
